protocol.name: P-GSE27552-10
protocol.text: standard Arabidopsis growth conditions in a Percival growth chamber - 16L/8D, 21 degrees day, 18 degrees night

protocol.name: P-GSE27552-12
protocol.text: Biotin labeling, Invitrogen Bioprime kit, following Borevitz 2005

protocol.name: P-GSE27552-14
protocol.text: Microarray Suite 5, data processed with JMP Genomics, R statistics RMA background correction, log2 transformation, quantile normalized individual probe data are provided in the supplementary file on the Series record. Analysis of individual probe-level data was performed in order to remove probes from the array that hybridized differently between accessions for related gene expression analysis.

protocol.name: P-GSE27552-2
protocol.text: During the drydown treatment each pot was weighed daily at ‘pre-dawn’ (WTpot&soil) and distilled water was added by pipette at the base of the rosette to bring the percent water remaining (WatRem%) in each pot to the target level for that day (e.g. 90% on day one, 80% on day two, etc.) until a final drying treatment level of ~50% was reached by all pots on the fifth day. A major goal of the slow drydown treatment was to allow the intact, growing plants to acclimate to the imposed soil moisture stress. WatRem% was calculated as 100*(WTpot&soil-DWpot&soil)/( FCpot&soil- DWpot&soil). Wet (control) pots were treated identically, except WatRem% was maintained near 90% for the entire drydown period.

protocol.name: P-GSE27552-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis accessions were grown in 6x6x5-cm plastic pots filled with ~150 ml Profile™ porous ceramic rooting media. Plants were thinned to one per pot and were grown and treatments applied in a controlled environment chamber with 10-h photoperiod of 330 µmol m-2 s-1 photosynthetic photon flux density. Daytime/nighttime temperatures were 23/18 C with 60% relative humidity. During growth all plants were fertilized with a complete, modified Hoagland's nutrient solution every two days and watered daily.

protocol.name: P-GSE27552-4
protocol.text: Qiagen RNAasy Plant Mini prep, samples initially harvested in RNAlater

protocol.name: P-GSE27552-5
protocol.text: biotin-labeled targets (cRNA) using a MessageAmp™ II-based protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE27552-6
protocol.text: standard Affymetrix protocol using Affymetrix Model 640 hybridization oven

protocol.name: P-GSE27552-8
protocol.text: Microarray Suite 5, data processed with JMP Genomics, R statistics RMA in R, custom CDF file, filtering of SFP
